restart.title: Are you sure you want to restart Frigate?

restarting.title: Frigate is Restarting
restarting.content: This page will reload in {{countdown}} seconds.

submitToPlus.label: Submit To Frigate+
submitToPlus.desc: Objects in locations you want to avoid are not false positives. Submitting them as false positives will confuse the model.

review.true.label: Confirm this label for Frigate Plus
review.false.label: Do not confirm this label for Frigate Plus

toast.success: Successfully started export. View the file in the /exports folder.

error.endTimeMustAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time

restreaming.NotEnabled: Restreaming is not enabled for this camera.
restreaming.desc: Set up go2rtc for additional live view options and audio for this camera.

showStats.label: Show stream stats
showStats.desc: Enable this option to show stream statistics as an overlay on the camera feed.

saveSearch.label: Save Search
saveSearch.desc: Provide a name for this saved search.
saveSearch.placeholder: Enter a name for your search
saveSearch.overwrite: {{searchName}} already exists. Saving will overwrite the existing value.
saveSearch.button.save.label: Save this search

confirmDelete.title: Confirm Delete
confirmDelete.desc:
Are you sure you want to delete all recorded video associated with this review item?

Hold the Shift key to bypass this dialog in the future.
confirmDelete.desc.selected:

Hold the Shift key to bypass this dialog in the future.
